body.name: GERGO Floor Lamp, Remote Control with 4 Color Temperatures, LED Torchiere Floor Lamp with Adjustable Reading Lamp for Bedroom, Standing Lamps for Living Room, Bulb Included (Matte Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 14 mins
features: [INTELLIGENT LAMP]: Two intelligent bulbs were included,you can easily adjust the color temperature (3000k-6000k) and brightness (5% - 100%) of Warm,Warm White,Cold White and White Daylight by using the remote control. . You could choose the combination of the color temperature and brightness to illuminate the different space. One remote was included in the package, The max control distance is 49.2 feet, it mean you could enjoy the distance control without leaving the bed or sofa.

[SEPARATE CONTROL]: Intelligent remote control, which makes a living room lamp to be a smart adjustment dimmable lamp, you could control the mother and daughter lamp separately as you prefer. When you like to working or study in the night, you could open the daughter lamp to focus. When you like to light up the full house, you could turn on both two lamp.

[GOOSE-NECK DESIGN]: The goose-neck of our floor lamps allows lighting at any angle. Adjustable goose-neck makes 5w eye protection daughter-lamp can scatter light at 90 degrees to illuminate different directions. You can adjust a more suitable angle when reading or working. Besides, the reading lamp can also be controlled separately to facilitate lighting in different situations.

[SAFE AND STURDY]: We take safety into our first consideration. Our installation design is step by step (from weighted base to the light bulb) and no tool needed, so it won’t have the potential of hurt. The 5 pound base of the stand up lamp is sturdy to protect your children or pet. Everyone could use this lamp by safe.

[SPACE-SAVING]: Standing lamp great for reading room and living room, the sky torchiere floor lamp only takes up a little space thanks to its slim, space-saving design. You can assemble this lamp without using any tools.This modern slender lamp can slide into narrow corners unobtrusively, and the base fits under your sofa. This is great because the mother and daughter lights on the flexible arms can be extended to the sofa to direct the light towards your reading or handicrafts.
body.description: GERGO Dimmable Floor Lamp With Remote Why is this a good product that touches people's hearts? Because we have added a remote control to this product, which is undoubtedly very convenient for pregnant women, the elderly and children, as well as multi-color temperature and brightness adjustment, which is suitable for every life scene. At the same time, we also come with two bulbs, you don't need to buy extra bulbs. And if the remote doesn't work, don't worry, just follow the instruction below. 1. Turn on/off the mother light by rotary switch 5 times within 10 seconds, after that the light will flash several times. 2. Turn off and turn on the mother light again through the rotary switch. 3. Then short press the 'Light 1' button 3 times within 10 seconds, the main light will flash. 4. Congratulations, the connection to the main light is successful!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #45,952 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #355 in Floor Lamps

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We put love and caring into our products. We know that for a pregnant woman, the elderly or anyone with limited mobility, it is very laborious to switch the light on and off. So our product team has specially equipped the light with remote control, which is designed for every customer and provide more convenience. We always make our products with love and hope, and hope that every customer can feel our heart.

This light supports stepless adjustment of 5%-100% brightness and 3000k-6000k color temperature, you can freely combine the color temperature and brightness to adapt to different scenes, when you are working, resting, taking care of your baby, or sleeping and resting, Different light modes can be selected to meet your needs. Different combinations, different lifestyles.

We also added a rotary switch for this light, both the mother-lamp and the daughter-lamp, which means you can control the two lights separately for different scenes.Imagine that, you can only turn on a small light when reading before going to bed, you can read and avoid too bright lights affecting sleep, or you want to read a little bit before bed. When you are studying and working, you only need to turn on the headlights to enjoy comfortable and bright lights.

Daughter-Lamp Sperate Control The unique design of our lamp allows the mother lamp and daughter lamp to be controlled separately, you can just turn on a small lamp to read before going to bed, reduce the stimulation of the light to help sleep. Space-Saving In Conrner The unique space-saving design makes our lights not take up a lot of space, just put them in the corner to provide light, and the stable base also provides you safe. Dierctly Control Without Moving For pregnant women, the elderly and children, using the remote control makes it safer and more convenient for them to control the light switch.

About We are a company specializing in lighting fixtures. Every consumer can feel love, hope and warmth from our products. We embody our values in our products through safety bases, remote controls, and skin-friendly materials, we don't just make lights, we also deliver warmth. GERGO Dimmable Floor Lamp With Remote Why is this a good product that touches people's hearts? Because we have added a remote control to this product, which is undoubtedly very convenient for pregnant women, the elderly and children, as well as multi-color temperature and brightness adjustment, which is suitable for every life scene. At the same time, we also come with two bulbs, you don't need to buy extra bulbs. And if the remote doesn't work, don't worry, just follow the instruction below. 1. Turn on/off the mother light by rotary switch 5 times within 10 seconds, after that the light will flash several times. 2. Turn off and turn on the mother light again through the rotary switch. 3. Then short press the 'Light 1' button 3 times within 10 seconds, the main light will flash. 4. Congratulations, the connection to the main light is successful!

Both Open This mode is great for work when you need more light to illuminate your surroundings so you can concentrate on your work. Daughter Lamp Open When reading, you could only turn on a small light and focus the light on the book, so that you can read the text in the book in detail without missing any wonderful details in the book. Mother-Lamp Open When you are taking care of the baby or before going to bed, you can just turn on a small light and keep the environment slightly dark to provide a comfortable atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this floor lamp super bright, but it can also project an amber-colored light which is soft and of use when you want a light glow. The remote is excellent and provides several different modes of light on both mother and daughter light fixtures.This is an excellent floor lamp which will be able to provide the bright, white intensity or the soft amber glow when the light of either light fixture is turned down. FIVE STARS….. Very simple to assemble!Update:Although we love the lamp, one of the bulbs went on the fritz after one week (and we followed all directions to see if we could sync the lightbulb with the remote.... we had no success. We would appreciate if the seller can arrange the shipping of an additional light bulb. I will update.....Update: Reduce my review by 3 stars. This company is impossible to deal with. They would not replace the A14 LED bulb (which no longer worked after 1 week). They told me to replace with a regular bulb which is unacceptable. Other reviewers have had the same issue with this lamp. So simply: BUYER BEWARE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the best purchases we have made—and reasonably priced. Love the different modes and dimmer. Having the remote is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great when it works!
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these, for rooms where there is no central ceiling light. The brightness functions and warmth of light features are GREAT! And I bought these because I wanted a remote control and bright lights.HOWEVER. On one of them the bigger light started going on the fritz within 2 months. I replaced the bulb, nothing. Eventually it no longer worked with the remote, and the fix on the website didn't work. So now you can no longer control the light brightness or coloring, because there is no manual button for that. And I can only get it to turn on/off by walking over and turning the knob on the lamp. That's inconvenient when I bought the light to be able to be turned on from the doorway of a dark room. I am hoping the other light does not do the same, but I will wait and see. So the one that works, I love! The one that went rogue...is kinda useless now, since I can't access the brightness or color features--just on/off. Thankfully, Amazon refunded me for that one. If you get this, assemble it and use it right away so you will know if you got a dud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamps with so many options!
reviews.reviewText: These lamps are easy to assemble and the options provided by the remote control make for lighting that fits every need. Great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product came quickly, was easy to assemble, and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There’s absolutely nothing I would change about this lamp. I have it in a confined area between my workstation and the wall. The remote is invaluable. To manually turn it on and off would be very inconvenient. However, the remote will change both the upper light and the downward light. Can have one or both of them on. The light is perfect for giving a general light to the whole area from the upper lamp and a focused light for working from the smaller lamp. It is a marvelous product at an extremely reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp for my daughters new apartment. She wanted to put something behind a table so the remote was very helpful. Lit up the room well .would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They worked beautifully until
reviews.reviewText: Our power went out, now the remote only works for one of the lights, doesn't dim or change the lights at all. I've unplugged and took the batteries out of the remote, hoping it would reset. No go. Totally defeats the purpose. Less than 4 months old. I would not purchased again.
